value:
Does the Order of Heroes have a
pegasus stable? I'd love to help take
care of the pegasi if you do.$k$pThat's one thing I'm good at!

I'm part of Lord Chrom's Shepherds.
I was a trainee, but I became a much
better fighter after I met my pegasus.

Out on patrol? Thank you for doing
that. But please make sure you
watch where you step.$k$pI tripped right around here just a
moment ago...

Would you like to try some flower
fortunes with me? Don't worry about
getting an unlucky result.$k$pThat just means you'll have to work
hard to make sure it doesn't come
true!

I was just reading one of my favorite
books: Mad Tales of a Bloodthirsty
Falcon Knight, Volume 2.$k$pI can lend you volume one if you're
interested.

Hello! I've come to bring you a
greeting from your friend
$Nf.$k$pOh, I don't mind waiting. I was doing
flower fortunes with the Heroes here!

This makes me so happy. I'll work
ever harder!
About time I made some progress.
I just can't do anything right, can I?

Sorry if I made you feel like you
should spend extra time on me.

I'm Sumia, of Chrom's Shepherds. I'm
a bit clumsy, but I promise I'll do my
best to help you out!

I can do it. I can't do it... I can do it.
I can't do it... I can— Oh, hello,
$Nu.$k$pI was just doing flower fortunes. I'm
trying to figure out if I can become
a proper Hero or not.$k$pFighting by your side has given me a
new goal. I don't want to be a klutz
forever. I want to become stronger.$k$pI want to become a Hero that looks
like she belongs by your side. But
I'm...just not that confident...$k$pSo I thought I'd consult the flowers. I
can't do it. I can do it... I can't... I can!$k$pOh, thank goodness! The flower says
I can do it! Now I just need to work
hard to prove it right.$k$pI'll become your strongest wings!
はい！
えい！
ひゃあっ！
Not again...
I'll end this now!
Coming through!
My turn!
I won't back down!
I'm sorry...
Hi!
Faring well?
I'm sorry.  I try my best, but I'm pretty sure I'll always be clumsy.
My pegusus is such a good girl! Yes she is!
I just love how there are so many different kinds of flowers here... Even some I've never seen before!
He loves me... He loves me not. He loves me... Oh! I was just doing flower fortunes.
I need to train harder. It's not like I don't have potential...
The fact that you believe in me... It makes me happier than words can express.
Yes
Here goes...
I'm with you!
